import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { AuthContext } from '../context/AuthContext'; import LocationSelector from '../components/LocationSelector'; const Profile = () => { const { user } = useContext(AuthContext) || {}; return (

My Profile

Manage your account settings and location

User Information

{user?.username?.charAt(0).toUpperCase() || 'U'}

{user?.username || 'Username'}

Email: {user?.email || 'Not available'}
Member Since: {user?.created_at ? new Date(user.created_at).toLocaleDateString() : 'Unknown'}

Location Settings

); }; export default Profile;
